title: In 19 states, it's OK to hit kids with a wooden board
text:
Terry sat in his middle school principal's office knowing that in a few short minutes, he would be feeling the pain and humiliation of being paddled. No parent, administrator or teacher should find this scenario acceptable. Yet, every school day, an estimated 838 students like Terry receive corporal punishment in American schools.
See the full story at Huffington Post
